alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 8:43PM MST until August 21 at 11:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 843 PM MST, Very heavy rainfall continues from Dolan Springs to Peach Springs. Rain gauges in the area have picked up rainfall rates exceeding 1 inch in per hour. Flash flooding is ongoing across the area. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Valentine, Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground, New Kingman-Butler, Grand Canyon Ranch, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, Chloride, Dolan Springs, Diamond Creek Campground, Diamond M Ranch and Peach Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
